page.title: 07A Day in the life of Carla 1
page.content: Monday morning is probably my worst morning, as it is difficult to get up after the weekend. I get up at about 7.25,I put my school uniform on,have breakfast,have a wash,clean my teeth,brush my hair,sort my school bag out,clean my shoes and feed my rabbit. At 8.15 I go to school.We have a playtime until 9.00,then we go upstairs to our classroom and work until 10.30,when it is playtime. At 10.45 we go back into class and some of the children have a drink of milk. We work again until 12.00 when it's lunchtime.By then I am quite hungry but I have to wait until 12.30 before I can have my lunch. When I leave the dinner hall I go outside to play. Sometimes I look after the rabbits. We line up in our classes when it is time to go in.
